province-state.description: province name; US/Canada/Australia/ - city name, state/province name; Others - name of the event (e.g., "Diamond Princess" cruise ship); other countries - blank.

country-region.description: country/region name conforming to WHO (will be updated).

update.description: Time of the last update that day (UTC)

confirmed.description: the number of confirmed cases. For Hubei Province: from Feb 13 (GMT +8), we report both clinically diagnosed and lab-confirmed cases. For lab-confirmed cases only (Before Feb 17), please refer to https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/tree/master/who_covid_19_situation_reports.
